name: DEAD FACE
description:
DEAD FACE

A bullet hell/hacking roguelike made for 7DRL 2018.

Features

  • Dodge a whirlwind of bullets and rockets
  • Drive huge, multi-tile mechs or let the mechs fight for you
  • Wield rocket launchers, machine guns, drills, lasers, and flamethowers
  • Stay hidden or push your luck by stealing corporate secrets
  • Hack everything!

Controls

  • 4-way movement: [WASD] or Arrows or Numpad or Vi-keys
  • Turning: [Q+E] or Y+U or 7+9
  • Wait: [SPACE] or .
  • Eject: [ESCAPE]
  • Toggle guns: [CLICK] on mech tile on sidebar

Hacking

You can hack any mech, alert system, or terminal. Hacking requires you to zero out the rows of numbers at the top left.

You can run commands (displayed in boxes on the right) in the console on the left. Careful! If a command has no effect, it will take away time.
